definition: murderous spirit/aura of death/to vent one's anger
to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
to have a murderous look in one's eyes (idiom)

sentences.english: Nazism was not only nationalism run amok.
sentences.chinese: 納粹不僅僅是殺氣騰騰的國家主義。

sentences.english: He sends ahead a strong murderous look and all step by step walks to the dollars.
sentences.chinese: 他散發出強大的殺氣，向元都一步步走去。

sentences.english: Hell for some time, full of murderous look will become more angry.
sentences.chinese: 地獄持續一段時間後，充滿殺氣的怒吼會變多。

sentences.english: A masked man ran amok in the town square.
sentences.chinese: 一個戴面具的人殺氣騰騰地闖進了市政廣場。

sentences.english: A few corporate pages have seemed combative.
sentences.chinese: 還有少數幾家公司頁面看起來殺氣騰騰。

sentences.english: In the murderous look of surprised day, whether have already heard heart-broken voice.
sentences.chinese: 驚天的殺氣中，是否已經聽見了心碎的聲音。

sentences.english: I can feel a Kung-Fu chill riding up my spine!
sentences.chinese: 我可以感覺一股殺氣在我後背挪動。

sentences.english: I could hear the bloodthirsty Dartmouth fans shouting.
sentences.chinese: 我聽見那些殺氣騰騰的達特默思球迷大聲叫好。

definition: to be shocked/to be appalled/to be terrified
evil influence/unhealthy trend/(a person's) evil air/aura of wickedness/(TCM) pathogenic energy (opposite: 正氣|正气[zheng4 qi4], vital energy)
baleful look/inauspicious influence/(of a tire, balloon etc) to leak air
to vent one's anger on (an innocent party)/to take it out on (sb)
to bare fangs and brandish claws (idiom); to make threatening gestures
